content: Chicago, meanwhile, could sell high on Jimmy Butler in exchange for youth and picks, both of which are crucial to any rebuild. Although a full-fledged rebuild may be tough for the Bulls to accept, the franchise probably needs to move on from the turbulent Rose-Butler administration, lest it remain mired in mediocrity. The no. 5 pick represents a tantalizing opportunity to add a blue-chip college prospect like Cal’s Jaylen Brown or Oklahoma’s Buddy Hield.
